title:
Dear My Reporter,



My Question is two-fold but related.

For the 2011-2012-2013 calendar years.



1.How much money was spent in New Hanover County in Educaional Lottery products.



2.How much money did New Hanover County receive for schools in each of the past three years vis Lottery Distribution?



Please advoise with many Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20957
